Vigilant Global | Montreal, Canada | Full-time | ONSITE Vigilant Global combines new and emerging technologies with sound and forward thinking strategies. A strong focus on research and development has allowed the firm to expand in the rapidly changing environment of electronic markets. Vigilant Global is among the top employers in Montreal for 2016.

What are we looking for?

  * Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering.
  * Strong experience with one or more dynamic languages (Python, Ruby, JavaScript).
  * Some experience with one or more web application frameworks (Ruby on Rails, Sinatra, Django/Flask, AngularJS).
  * Experience with provisioning tools (Ansible, Chef) an asset.
  * Innovative thinking and problem solving.
Apply online at http://www.vigilantglobal.com/en/careers
